name: Rabbit

name: Cat
description: A friendly house cat that purrs when happy.

description: A loyal companion that loves to play fetch.

name: Bird
description: A small songbird with beautiful feathers.

name: Mouse
description: A tiny mouse that squeaks adorably.

name: Fox
description: A clever fox with a beautiful red coat.

name: Wolf
description: A wild wolf that howls at the moon.

name: Bear
description: A large bear that loves honey and fish.

description: An adorable panda that munches on bamboo.

description: A sleepy koala that loves eucalyptus leaves.

description: The king of the jungle with a mighty roar.

name: Elephant

name: Giraffe
description: The tallest animal with beautiful spots.

name: Dragon
description: A legendary dragon that breathes fire and soars through the sky.

name: Unicorn
description: A magical unicorn with a spiraling horn and rainbow mane.

name: Phoenix
description: A mythical bird that rises from its own ashes.

name: Kraken
description: A colossal sea monster with powerful tentacles.

description: A divine feline that controls the stars and cosmic energy.
